name: nextcloud-link
description: Javascript API to talk to Nextcloud

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run types:generate
scripts.types:generate: npx --package typescript tsc source/*.ts source/**/*.ts --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir compiled/source/
scripts.docker: npm run docker:stop && docker-compose -p nextcloud-link up -d
scripts.test: npm run docker && ts-node tests/prepare-docker-nextcloud-container.ts && jest --config jest.conf.js --runInBand; npm run docker:stop
scripts.test-ci: npm run docker && ts-node tests/prepare-docker-nextcloud-container.ts && jest --config jest.conf.js --runInBand
scripts.test-watch: npm run docker && ts-node tests/prepare-docker-nextcloud-container.ts && jest --config jest.conf.js --runInBand --watch
